remarks: The composition of subclasses of a transitive relation is a subclass of that relation.  (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)
statement:
trrelssd.r $e |- ( ph -> ( R o. R ) C_ R ) $.
trrelssd.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ R ) $.
trrelssd.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ R ) $.
trrelssd $p |- ( ph -> ( S o. T ) C_ R ) $.
